name: Veeam
0:
”Alexa, open Veeam Availability”
”Why do businesses turn to Veeam?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: veeam availability
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Every day, more and more legacy backup customers switch to Veeam. Why? Because technologies designed for the client-server era cannot deliver the 24.7.365 Availability today’s businesses demand with the ability to restore any IT service running in the hybrid cloud within seconds and minutes.

But don’t take our word… Ask your new personal assistant – Alexa!

Get Started
Search “Veeam Availability” in the Skills section of your Alexa app to enable. Then say,“Alexa, open Veeam Availability.”

1. Why do businesses turn to Veeam?

2. Which vendor has the most comprehensive and forward-looking vision?

3. How does Veeam’s growth compare to legacy backup providers?

4. How does Veeam compare to the complexity of deploying other solutions?

5. How are Veeam’s capabilities different?

6. What is the #1 reason enterprise organizations select Veeam?

7. How does Veeam rank in customer satisfaction?
